attributes.action: All vehicles using UK roads to have lights on whilst driving.
attributes.background: As a driver of many years I have seen countless people driving in low light areas driving appropriate lighting. We need to make it so everyone contributes to a safer road.

rejection.details:
There are already legal requirements and guidance for using lights when driving, set out in the Highway Code. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/the-highway-code/general-rules-techniques-and-advice-for-all-drivers-and-riders-103-to-158

You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the rules and guidance on lighting requirements.
